shortened_description: Mr. Harrison's request for credit line adjustment, including updated business plan, cash flow projections, and account summary.
reason: Attachments include business plan (Harrison_BusinessPlan_Oct2024.pdf) and cash flow projections (Harrison_CashFlow_Q4_2024.xlsx). Front office team assesses creditworthiness. Business showing 'a lot of promise'. Account number and agreement ID provided.
other_comments: High confidence in credit line adjustment request type.
